snippet: As the staff of AOL's AIM unit is cut, some people may be wondering what AIM is or was. The answer: pretty darn useful, but only because it isn't some white-hot Internet phenomenon.
abstract: As the staff of AOL's AIM unit is cut, some people may be wondering what AIM is or was. The answer: pretty darn useful, but only because it isn't some white-hot Internet phenomenon.

headline.main: AOL's AIM Is So Passé It's Useful
